author: _shemnon
content: meta question, will the exeicution-apis repo integrate with the EIP process?  Will those changes be merged in or has it become a new path for RPC specs.  Are RPC specs kind of like the ERC specs for smart contract level interactions like Token and NFT interfaces?

author: sky.cactus
content: Tentative plan is to keep execution-apis separate from the EIP process.  That being said, I don't know if anyone is maintaining that repository (not that the APIs were maintained when they were EIP managed either though).

author: _shemnon
content: We should formalize the split then and make it explicit.  This may help the ERC split question.

author: sky.cactus
content: I believe it is "official", though there may be some docs that need updated.

author: _shemnon
content: Adding notations and URLs in the relevant RPC EIPs is what I think is missing.
